Pre-Game Insights: New York is not our house. We have only spent four to six days here.
It rained for three days and we did not practice.
We don’t know what pitch we will get, and we don’t know how it will play.
The curator was confused about how the track will play; how much grass to remove or leave on.
There were chuckles in the press conference hall when Rohit spoke about his interaction with the pitch curator.
